      • connect

        public static boolean connect(java.lang.String networkConnection,
                              java.lang.String userInterface,
                              java.lang.String ip,
                              java.lang.String port)
        creates the right view according to the user's will,
        Parameters:
        ip - needed to initialize both socket and rmi networkhandler
        networkConnection - needed to create the view and initialize the right NetworkHandler
        port - needed to initialize the socket network handler
        userInterface - needed to create the view and initialize both of the networkhandler
        Returns:
        boolean value that indicates if the connection attempt was successful

      • startClientSocketOrRMIWithCLI
